text: Nyoe Kamoe wasiet teuma Meupeugah Kamoe wasiet nyoe bak manusia Ma-ku dua beu got jipapah Meu geuyue gata peucharikat Lon A Tateupeue pih tan peue nyang geupeugah Nyan bek taikot ureueng nyan dua Dudoe sit gata tawoe bak Allah f â€˜Oh tawoe bak Lon teuma Lon tuntut Peue nyang tapeubuet bandum Lon peugah
